alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 20 at 1:49PM CST until January 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Significant icing possible. Total ice accumulations of one quarter of an inch to one half of an inch is possible. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE...Portions of western and northwestern Arkansas. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Winter Storm Watch is issued when there is the potential of significant and hazardous winter weather within 48 hours. With this winter storm, there could be enough ice accumulation to cause damage to trees and powerlines.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
